title: What song did you love that you currently hate? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on your taste on what you think but hate and love are both powerful words to use in my honest opinion, but which song I liked at first but now dislike? “Am I Wrong” by Nico and Vinz. I thought it was a good and a catchy song at first and it was about to be my jam and it was about to be my favorites, but when they are playing all over again….. I started to dislike it and I had enough of the same song all over again. Ugh…. I now dislike it and I now can’t stand it. -Evelyn M.
